approach_1_webfetch.description: Use WebFetch API with comprehensive extraction prompts
prompts: Extract all available course information from this Genesys training page. Include: course title, description, duration, difficulty level, learning objectives, prerequisites, target audience, and any structured educational data. Look for JSON-LD, metadata, or embedded course catalog information.
Focus on finding the course duration, time commitment, or length. Search for patterns like '30 minutes', '1-2 hours', 'Duration:', 'Estimated time:', or any time-related information.
Extract the main course description, summary, or overview. Look for detailed explanations of what the course covers, learning outcomes, or educational objectives.

approach_2_api_discovery.description: Look for hidden API endpoints that serve course data

approach_3_pattern_analysis.method: URL pattern analysis for direct course data
approach_3_pattern_analysis.description: Test if course data is available through direct API calls

approach_4_browser_automation.description: Use Selenium with longer wait times and specific element detection
approach_4_browser_automation.requirements: Fix Chrome driver architecture issue or use alternative browser
